sentence.Network_en: The penguin is a flightless bird.
sentence.Network_cn: 企鹅是一种不会飞的鸟.

sentence.Network_en: New Zealanders proudly display their kiwi , a native flightless bird.
sentence.Network_cn: 纽西兰人则骄傲地展示他们的鹬鸵, 一种不会飞的鸟.

sentence.Network_en: Sightless and flightless, they exist only to be impregnated.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些雌性昆虫既没有视力,也无法飞行, 它们存在的唯一目的就是受孕生子.

entry.tran: (鸟或昆虫)不能飞的，没有飞行能力的
entry.def: A flightless bird or insect is unable to fly because it does not have the necessary type of wings.
